sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: STERN, the poſterior face of a ſhip ; or that part which is repreſented to the view of a spectator, placed on the continuation of the keel behind. The ſtern is terminated above by the taffarel, and below by the counters ; it is limited on the ſides by the quarter-pieces, and the intermediate ſpace comprehends the galleries and windows of the different cabins. See QU arter, of a Ship, Ship, and Ship-building.
